title: 582 4 "Startling! The Secret of the Island Is Finally Revealed!"Transliteration: "Kyōgaku! Tsui ni Akasareru Shima no Himitsu" (Japanese:驚愕！遂に明かされる島の秘密) Yoshihiro Ueda Tomohiro Nakayama January 27, 2013(2013-01-27) September 11, 2022
transformers_text: 582 4 Startling The Secret of the Island Is Finally Revealed Transliteration Ky gaku Tsui ni Aka s are ru Shima no Him its u Japanese Yoshihiro Ueda Tomohiro Nakayama January 27 2013 2013 01 27 September 11 2022 Franky Sanji Nami and Chopper are shocked that the samurai survived being cut He's surprised by Nami's bluntness and revealing outfit but says he likes it irritating Sanji When he learns they're pirates he refuses to go with them stating he hates pirates and came to the island to find his son Franky blasts a hole in the wall with his Radical Beam and they escape into a room full of giant children Meanwhile Luffy races a centaur he befriended Us opp contacts Brook who reports that Nami Sanji Franky and Chopper were captured The centaur receives a call saying Luffy is an enemy so Luffy defeats him and Robin takes out another attacker The crew notices the Transponder Snails used by the centaurs have CC on them The Master learns the Straw Hats have escaped that one of them can shoot laser beams like a Pacifist a and that they're in the biscuit room with the giant kids He also hears that the Marines are arriving and orders poison gas to be released on them The G 5 Marines begin to suffocate but quickly put on gas masks in order to avoid suffocation Smoker then reveals this island was where Aoki ji and Aka in u fought for the title of Fleet Admiral two years ago
tf_idf_text: startle secret island finally reveal transliteration gaku tsui aka shima japanese yoshihiro ueda tomohiro nakayama january september franky sanji nami chopper shock samurai survive cut he surprise namis bluntness reveal outfit say like irritate sanji learns theyre pirate refuse state hate pirate come island find son franky blast hole wall radical beam escape room full giant child meanwhile luffy race centaur befriend opp contact brook report nami sanji franky chopper capture centaur receives call say luffy enemy luffy defeat robin take another attacker crew notice transponder snail use centaur master learns straw hat escape one shoot laser beam like pacifist theyre biscuit room giant kid also hear marine arrive order poison gas release marine begin suffocate quickly put gas mask order avoid suffocation smoker reveals island aoki aka fight title fleet admiral two year ago
